revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = NXP |model = MRX |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2010 |revision = C2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 23, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/NXP_MRX2010_rev_C2 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = WOPMRX2010C2, WOPMRX2010 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:60:37
|chip1 = Metalink;MtW8171;MtW8171LB-B0G, TA-P60857XA7M, 0716 ES; |chip2 = Metalink;MtW8151;MtW8151QF-D1, JA-K56394XA2M, 0711 ES; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Anadigics;AWL6951R;;2;InGaP HBT; |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/14/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Indonesia |powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "MRX2010-C2" is etched onto the board in the FCC photos. <!-- NuTune --> {{See also|NXP MRX2000|NXP|Metalink}}
